body:
What's up? 

My name is MCLP_S and I recently just joined the Avicus Network! 

Thing's about me : 

  • I'm 14 years old.
  • My nickname is Lipshy
  • I eat bacon allot.
  • I'm from Poland, Warsaw.
  • I can speak English and Polish fluently.
Thank you!

title: Hey! I'm MC!

replies.body:
Welcome to Avicus! If you have any questions, please feel free to contact me or any staff member!
Also, you can join us on our TeamSpeak 3 client! (ts.avicus.net)
Enjoy your stay! :D

replies.body: Hey! Welcome to Avicus ^-^! Hope to see you in game sometime, if you ever need to talk to someone. You can add me on Skype :) Anyway, enjoy your time on Avicus!
